name: Plumeria Console
description: The Plumeria Console by Kifu Paris is a dramatic and sculptural piece. The cream shagreen inlaid top sits on clusters of bronze-patina brass legs that are conceptually inspired by bird feathers floating on top of a lake. The border of the top is accentuated by a subtle and elegant bronze-patina brass indentation detail. This piece is designed by Kifu Augousti the daughter of Ria and Yiouri Augousti. Available in other finishes. Part of the Plumeria Capsule.
